dict.acceptation: 尖声喊叫，拼命叫喊；喊叫着说出；尖叫得使变…；
尖叫；发出尖锐刺耳的声音；
尖叫声，惊叫声；拼命的叫喊声；极其滑稽可笑的人；

sent.orig: Compare cry, shout, yell and scream.
Compare cry (out), shout, yell and scream.
sent.trans: 试比较cry (out)、 shout、 yell、 scream的用法。

sent.orig: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice-scream!
sent.trans: 我尖叫，你尖叫，我们都为了冰淇淋而尖叫！

sent.orig: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice-cream!
sent.trans: 本人叫喊，你叫喊，本人们都喊着要冰淇淋！

sent.orig: I scream. You scream. Now we can all scream at ice cream.
sent.trans: 我尖叫，你尖叫，现在我们都可以对着冰淇淋尖叫。
